name: iqc-training-pro
description: Hệ thống xác nhận đào tạo IQC chuyên nghiệp

scripts.build-app: npm run clean-www && mkdir www && xcopy "index.html" "www\" /Y && xcopy "index.tsx" "www\" /Y && xcopy "App.tsx" "www\" /Y && xcopy "types.ts" "www\" /Y && xcopy "constants.tsx" "www\" /Y && xcopy "manifest.json" "www\" /Y && xcopy "metadata.json" "www\" /Y && (if exist "views" xcopy "views" "www\views" /E /I /Y) && (if exist "components" xcopy "components" "www\components" /E /I /Y) && (if exist "lib" xcopy "lib" "www\lib" /E /I /Y) && (if exist android (npx cap sync android) else (npx cap add android))
scripts.re-add-android: if exist android (rmdir /s /q android) && npx @capacitor/cli add android

author: IQC Quality Control
